-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A simple library for accessing Azure blob storage
--   
@package azurify
@version 0.4.0.5


-- | Azurify is an incomplete yet sort-of-functional library and command
--   line client to access the Azure Blob Storage API
--   
--   The following features are implemented:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>Creating and deleting containers<ul><li>Listing the contents of a
--   container</li><li>Downloading blobs</li><li>Uploading a new block blob
--   if it's no larger than 64MB</li><li>Deleting a blob</li><li>Breaking a
--   blob lease</li></ul></li>
--   </ul>
module Azure

-- | Create a new container
createContainer :: ByteString -> ByteString -> ByteString -> AccessControl -> IO (Maybe (Int, ByteString))

-- | Delete a container
deleteContainer :: ByteString -> ByteString -> ByteString -> IO (Maybe (Int, ByteString))

-- | List all blobs in a given container
listContainerRaw :: ByteString -> ByteString -> ByteString -> IO (Either (Int, ByteString) ByteString)

-- | List all blobs in a given container
listContainer :: ByteString -> ByteString -> ByteString -> IO (Either (Int, ByteString) [Blob])

-- | Set the access control on a container
changeContainerACL :: ByteString -> ByteString -> ByteString -> AccessControl -> IO (Maybe (Int, ByteString))

-- | Upload a new blob to a container
createBlob :: ByteString -> ByteString -> ByteString -> BlobSettings -> IO (Maybe (Int, ByteString))

-- | Delete a blob from a container
deleteBlob :: ByteString -> ByteString -> ByteString -> ByteString -> IO (Maybe (Int, ByteString))

-- | Download a blob
getBlob :: ByteString -> ByteString -> ByteString -> ByteString -> IO (Either (Int, ByteString) ByteString)

-- | Break a lease of a blob
breakLease :: ByteString -> ByteString -> ByteString -> ByteString -> IO (Maybe (Int, ByteString))
data AccessControl

-- | the container can be enumerated and all blobs can be read by anonymous
--   users
ContainerPublic :: AccessControl

-- | blobs can be read by anonymous users, but the container cannot be
--   enumerated
BlobPublic :: AccessControl

-- | blobs can't be read by anonymous users and the container cannot be
--   enumerated
Private :: AccessControl
data CommonBlobSettings
BlobSettings :: Maybe ByteString -> Maybe ByteString -> Maybe ByteString -> Maybe ByteString -> Maybe ByteString -> [(Text, Text)] -> CommonBlobSettings
blobSettingsContentType :: CommonBlobSettings -> Maybe ByteString
blobSettingsContentEncoding :: CommonBlobSettings -> Maybe ByteString
blobSettingsContentLanguage :: CommonBlobSettings -> Maybe ByteString
blobSettingsContentMD5 :: CommonBlobSettings -> Maybe ByteString
blobSettingsCacheControl :: CommonBlobSettings -> Maybe ByteString
blobSettingsMetaData :: CommonBlobSettings -> [(Text, Text)]
data BlobSettings
BlockBlobSettings :: ByteString -> ByteString -> CommonBlobSettings -> BlobSettings
blockBlobName :: BlobSettings -> ByteString
blockBlobContents :: BlobSettings -> ByteString
blockBlobSettings :: BlobSettings -> CommonBlobSettings
FileBlobSettings :: ByteString -> FilePath -> CommonBlobSettings -> BlobSettings
blockBlobName :: BlobSettings -> ByteString
blockBlobFile :: BlobSettings -> FilePath
blockBlobSettings :: BlobSettings -> CommonBlobSettings
PageBlobSettings :: ByteString -> Integer -> CommonBlobSettings -> BlobSettings
pageBlobName :: BlobSettings -> ByteString
pageBlobContentLength :: BlobSettings -> Integer
pageBlobSettings :: BlobSettings -> CommonBlobSettings
data BlobType
PageBlob :: BlobType
BlockBlob :: BlobType
data Blob
Blob :: ByteString -> ByteString -> ByteString -> ByteString -> Integer -> ByteString -> ByteString -> ByteString -> ByteString -> ByteString -> BlobType -> Blob
blobName :: Blob -> ByteString
blobUrl :: Blob -> ByteString
blobLastModified :: Blob -> ByteString
blobETag :: Blob -> ByteString
blobContentLength :: Blob -> Integer
blobContentType :: Blob -> ByteString
blobContentEncoding :: Blob -> ByteString
blobContentLanguage :: Blob -> ByteString
blobContentMD5 :: Blob -> ByteString
blobCacheControl :: Blob -> ByteString
blobType :: Blob -> BlobType
